title: FS: T206 HOFers with Uncommon Backs - PRICE DROP !
author: OldOriole

posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOFers with Uncommon Backs - PRICE DROP !
posts.post_content:
Offered for sale are four (4) individual T206's.  Each card has a Sovereign or Tolstoi back.  Shipping is $4.00 per card.  Payment by PayPal f/f please.  Prices on the remaining three cards were reduced 5/17.  Cards are:

Bresnahan SGC 60 (Port) - Sovereign 350 - $425
G. Davis SGC 60 - Sovereign 150 - $900
Huggins SGC 50 (Hands at Mouth) - Sov 350 - SOLD
Tinker SGC 60 (Bat on) - Tolstoi - $1,350 - this card has a little bit of the name that appears on the top border.
Can you list what the grades are?

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1776071]Can you list what the grades are?[/QUOTE]

Absolutely, sorry about that!  Grades are in the OP now.
Can I see the Huggins pics? [url]Gijoemonterey@yahoo.com[/url]
The Huggins card is now sold.
